## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9c48e2ab0480956dd0db4c0bc2e946be8a52112fb31f959900edb9a914f02367)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'wm-lib-api-error-handler' @ 1.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
